article_title: Is The U.S. Heading Into A Recession?
article_text:
Three months of weak jobs reports, major dips in the stock market and flat wages have many investors and analysts worried about the state of the U.S. economy. Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson asks Diane Swonk, chief economist at Mesirow Financial, whether the U.S. is heading into a recession and what to expect in the coming months.

Guest
